name: Kahoot
title: kahoot.com
shortDescription: Kahoot! is a game-based learning platform designed to make education engaging and interactive. It is suitable for educational institutions, businesses, and personal use. Users can create quizzes, discussions, and surveys that promote user interaction and learning. For example, teachers can use Kahoot! to conduct fun quizzes in class to reinforce learning, while companies can use it for training sessions to enhance employee engagement.
pros: Easy to create and share educational games
Supports a wide range of use cases from education to business
cons: May not suit all learning styles
